location.zh-cn: 哈尔滨市南岗区建设街146号

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省人民政府主管财政收支、财税政策的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the People's Government of Heilongjiang Province of the People's Republic of China, responsible for fiscal revenue and expenditure, and fiscal and tax policies.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国黑龙江省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Heilongjiang Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 构成黑龙江省人民政府的职能部门的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the functional departments that constitute the People's Government of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly referred to as 'China'.

description.en: The capital city of Heilongjiang Province, China.

description.en: A municipal district of Harbin city, Heilongjiang Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Chinese politician, former Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省财政厅是黑龙江省人民政府的上级机构。
description.en: The Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province is a subordinate agency of the People's Government of Heilongjiang Province.

relationships.target: 黑龙江省人民政府组成部门

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省财政厅是黑龙江省人民政府的组成部门之一。
description.en: The Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province is one of the component departments of the People's Government of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 孟祥会自2022年3月起担任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Meng Xianghui has served as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province since March 2022.

description.zh-cn: 赵谦担任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Zhao Qian serves as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 刘振林担任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Liu Zhenlin serves as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 王宇担任黑龙江省财政厅副厅长。
description.en: Wang Yu serves as the Deputy Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 李继纯于2001年12月至2010年4月期间担任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Li Jichun served as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province from December 2001 to April 2010.

description.zh-cn: 王庆江于2010年4月至2016年10月期间担任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Wang Qingjiang served as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province from April 2010 to October 2016.

description.zh-cn: 史青衿于2016年10月至2020年8月期间担任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Shi Qingjin served as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province from October 2016 to August 2020.

description.zh-cn: 高大伟于2020年8月至2022年3月期间担任黑龙江省财政厅厅长。
description.en: Gao Dawei served as the Director of the Department of Finance of Heilongjiang Province from August 2020 to March 2022.
